alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:25AM MST until March 05 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph this afternoon. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard and Williams. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from noon Today to 5 AM Saturday: Doney Park 1 to 3 inches Flagstaff 3 to 5 inches Forest Lakes 4 to 6 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 2 inches Williams 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim
